name: @specy/s68k
description: An M68000 emulator written in Rust and compiled to WebAssembly for teaching purposes.

scripts.ci-build: npm i -g wasm-pack && npm run build-all
scripts.build-all: npm run build-wasm && npm run build-lib
scripts.build-wasm: cd .. && cargo test && wasm-pack build --out-dir ts-lib/src/pkg --out-name s68k
